activities: XO provides Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) cloud computing solutions to corporate clients (Client(s)).  The resources used by XO to provide the IaaS cloud services do not permit XO to access information controlled or processed by Clients.  XO is, thus, not aware of the nature of any Client information, personal or otherwise.
contacttitle1: VP & Asst. GC / Chief Privacy Officer
corpofftitle1: VP & Asst. GC / Chief Privacy Officer
